ice_essence_shop: <white>Can be upgraded at the <light_purple>Ice Essence Shop</light_purple></white>
gold_essence_shop: <white>Can be upgraded at the <light_purple>Gold Essence Shop</light_purple></white>
diamond_essence_shop: <white>Can be upgraded at the <light_purple>Diamond Essence Shop</light_purple></white>
crimson_essence_shop: <white>Can be upgraded at the <light_purple>Crimson Essence Shop</light_purple></white>

hoppity_parser.desc: Parse all Hoppity Rabbits from Hypixels Rabbits UI in an rarity to api name format

midas_lure: <white>Increases your chances of fishing up a </white>
<white><gold>Gold Trophy Fish</gold> in the <red>Crimson Isle</red> by <green>2-20%</green>.</white>
radiant_fisher: <white>Increases your chances of fishing up a</white>
<white><aqua>Diamond Trophy Fish</aqua> in the <red>Crimson Isle</red> by <green>2-20%</green>.</white>

treasures_of_the_earth: <white>Increases your chances of spawning a Worm or Scatha when mining Hard Stone</white>
dwarven_training: <white>Increases your <dark_aqua>☯ Mining Wisdom</dark_aqua> while on Mining Islands</white>
eager_miner: <white>Increases your <gold>⸕ Mining Speed</gold> while on Mining Islands</white>
rhinestone_infusion: <white>Increases <light_purple>Gemstone</light_purple> <gold>☘ Mining Fortune</gold> while on Mining Islands</white>
high_roller: <white>Gain <green>1</green> extra random drop when obtaining a</white> <light_purple>Crystal Nucleus Bundle</light_purple>
return_to_sender: <white>Increases the chances of a <aqua>Diamond Goblin</aqua> spawning</white>
